title: 'A simple sturdy sofa set'
body: 'The sofa set is sturdy and the color is beautiful.. the quality seems good and there were no scratches or damages in it. Except the cork was missing on one of the legs. Assembling the product was easy even though they didn‚Äôt provide a manual but the markings on the pieces were easy to understand. The seat cushion is firm and hopefully it won‚Äôt sink after a few months. The fabric used on the sofa is also good. The weight is light so it tends to shift back and forth if we apply a little force while sitting.  Overall it‚Äôs a good buy at the price available.'

title: 'A LOVELY PRODUCT WITH GREAT SHIPPING SKILLS'
body: 'I have been using the furniture for the last two months and it has been liked not only by my family members but also by all my guests. It is glossy sturdy and authentic made up of pure Sheesham Wood. If you are a lover of Sheesham as well go ahead unhesitatingly. It is a cherry on top of the cake.  The packaging by the seller was so fantastic as well and it took them only 6-7 days to get it delivered. The seller had been in constant touch with me.'

title: 'Good Buy'
body: This is a great purchase. At the price that it comes, it robust, sturdy, comfortable within expectation and acceptable finished within tolerance. It's not self-assembly ready but other than that it's great.
